name: COLORSHIPS
description:
Colorships is a small arcade topdown-shooter space video game made in a couple of weeks as the final project for a Unity and C# course.

We have learned a lot thanks to this work, we created everything except the sounds, that we got from a webpage :)

We are Alejandro Terriza,  César Armijo, Manuel Florido and our class team is called CRNVRS.

[CONTROLS]

WASD to MOVE

Left click to shoot

Right click to color dash.
